name: games_by_category_or_tag
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool free_to_play_games_database.
Tool description: Free-to-play games database powered by FreeToGame.com!
API description: Fetches a list of games based on the given category or tag from the MMO Games API.

category.description: The category or tag of the games to fetch (e.g., "mmorpg", "shooter", "pvp", "mmofps").
